name: dotkernel/dot-authentication-service
description: Concrete implementation of an AuthenticationInterface based on Zend Authentication

suggest.zendframework/zend-db: Needed if you are using the CallbackCheckAdapter
suggest.zendframework/zend-session: Used by the SessionStorage to store authentication identity
suggest.zendframework/zend-psr7bridge: Util lib for converting ZF3 HTTP messages to PSR7 and vice-versa
suggest.zendframework/zend-hydrator: Used by the authentication adapters to hydrate identity objects
